long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is the graphical front end for evQueue, the open source job scheduler.

Using this interface, you can easily create and plan jobs or workflows. It also supports conditions, loops, execution retrying on failure and queues management for parallelization.

Using this extension also requires the C++ engine which is downloadable on the official website.
